TestCase.name: testFullJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, b1 FROM A FULL JOIN B ON a1 = b1

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[full]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Join(joinType=[FullOuterJoin], where=[=(a1, b1)], select=[a1, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testFullJoinNonEqui
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, b1 FROM A FULL JOIN B ON a1 = b1 AND a2 > b2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), >($1, $4))], joinType=[full]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Calc(select=[a1, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Join(joinType=[FullOuterJoin], where=[AND(=(a1, b1), >(a2, b2))], select=[a1, a2, b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testFullJoinWithEqualPk
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, b1 FROM (SELECT SUM(a2) AS a2, a1 FROM A GROUP BY a1) FULL JOIN (SELECT SUM(b2) AS b2, b1 FROM B GROUP BY b1) ON a1 = b1

LogicalProject(a1=[$1], b1=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $3)], joinType=[full]) :- LogicalProject(a2=[$1], a1=[$0]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a2=[SUM($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a1=[$0], a2=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalProject(b2=[$1], b1=[$0]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b2=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(b1=[$0], b2=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Join(joinType=[FullOuterJoin], where=[=(a1, b1)], select=[a1, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b1], select=[b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testFullJoinWithEqualPkNonEqui
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, b1 FROM (SELECT SUM(a2) AS a2, a1 FROM A GROUP BY a1) FULL JOIN (SELECT SUM(b2) AS b2, b1 FROM B GROUP BY b1) ON a1 = b1 AND a2 > b2

LogicalProject(a1=[$1], b1=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($1, $3), >($0, $2))], joinType=[full]) :- LogicalProject(a2=[$1], a1=[$0]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a2=[SUM($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a1=[$0], a2=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalProject(b2=[$1], b1=[$0]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b2=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(b1=[$0], b2=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Calc(select=[a1, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Join(joinType=[FullOuterJoin], where=[AND(=(a1, b1), >(a2, b2))], select=[a2, a1, b2, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a2, a1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1, SUM(a2) AS a2], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b2, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b1], select=[b1, SUM(b2) AS b2], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testFullJoinWithFullNotPk
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, b1 FROM (SELECT SUM(a2) AS a2, a1 FROM A GROUP BY a1) FULL JOIN B ON a1 = b1

LogicalProject(a1=[$1], b1=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $2)], joinType=[full]) :- LogicalProject(a2=[$1], a1=[$0]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a2=[SUM($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a1=[$0], a2=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Join(joinType=[FullOuterJoin], where=[=(a1, b1)], select=[a1, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testFullJoinWithFullNotPkNonEqui
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, b1 FROM (SELECT SUM(a2) AS a2, a1 FROM A GROUP BY a1) FULL JOIN B ON a1 = b1 AND a2 > b2

LogicalProject(a1=[$1], b1=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($1, $2), >($0, $3))], joinType=[full]) :- LogicalProject(a2=[$1], a1=[$0]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a2=[SUM($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a1=[$0], a2=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Calc(select=[a1, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Join(joinType=[FullOuterJoin], where=[AND(=(a1, b1), >(a2, b2))], select=[a2, a1, b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a2, a1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1, SUM(a2) AS a2], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testFullJoinWithPk
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, a2, b1, b2 FROM (SELECT SUM(a2) AS a2, a1 FROM A GROUP BY a1) FULL JOIN (SELECT SUM(b2) AS b2, b1 FROM B GROUP BY b1) ON a2 = b2

LogicalProject(a1=[$1], a2=[$0], b1=[$3], b2=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[full]) :- LogicalProject(a2=[$1], a1=[$0]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a2=[SUM($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a1=[$0], a2=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalProject(b2=[$1], b1=[$0]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b2=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(b1=[$0], b2=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Calc(select=[a1, a2, b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Join(joinType=[FullOuterJoin], where=[=(a2, b2)], select=[a2, a1, b2, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) : +- Calc(select=[a2, a1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) : +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1, SUM(a2) AS a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b2]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Calc(select=[b2, b1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b1], select=[b1, SUM(b2) AS b2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testFullJoinWithPkNonEqui
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, a2, b1, b2 FROM (SELECT SUM(a2) AS a2, a1 FROM A GROUP BY a1) FULL JOIN (SELECT SUM(b2) AS b2, b1 FROM B GROUP BY b1) ON a2 = b2 AND a1 > b1

LogicalProject(a1=[$1], a2=[$0], b1=[$3], b2=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $2), >($1, $3))], joinType=[full]) :- LogicalProject(a2=[$1], a1=[$0]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a2=[SUM($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a1=[$0], a2=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalProject(b2=[$1], b1=[$0]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b2=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(b1=[$0], b2=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Calc(select=[a1, a2, b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Join(joinType=[FullOuterJoin], where=[AND(=(a2, b2), >(a1, b1))], select=[a2, a1, b2, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) : +- Calc(select=[a2, a1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) : +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1, SUM(a2) AS a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b2]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Calc(select=[b2, b1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b1], select=[b1, SUM(b2) AS b2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, b1 FROM A JOIN B ON a1 = b1

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Join(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a1, b1)], select=[a1, b1]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]]) : +- Calc(select=[a1]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]]) +- Calc(select=[b1]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithEqualPk
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, b1 FROM (SELECT SUM(a2) AS a2, a1 FROM A GROUP BY a1) JOIN (SELECT SUM(b2) AS b2, b1 FROM B GROUP BY b1) ON a1 = b1

LogicalProject(a1=[$1], b1=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $3)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(a2=[$1], a1=[$0]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a2=[SUM($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a1=[$0], a2=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalProject(b2=[$1], b1=[$0]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b2=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(b1=[$0], b2=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Join(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a1, b1)], select=[a1, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b1], select=[b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithMiniBatch
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, b1 FROM A JOIN B ON a1 = b1

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Join(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a1, b1)], select=[a1, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testLeftJoinWithEqualPk
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, b1 FROM (SELECT SUM(a2) AS a2, a1 FROM A GROUP BY a1) LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(b2) AS b2, b1 FROM B GROUP BY b1) ON a1 = b1

LogicalProject(a1=[$1], b1=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $3)], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalProject(a2=[$1], a1=[$0]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a2=[SUM($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a1=[$0], a2=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalProject(b2=[$1], b1=[$0]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b2=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(b1=[$0], b2=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Join(joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], where=[=(a1, b1)], select=[a1, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b1], select=[b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithPk
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, a2, b1, b2 FROM (SELECT SUM(a2) AS a2, a1 FROM A GROUP BY a1) JOIN (SELECT SUM(b2) AS b2, b1 FROM B GROUP BY b1) ON a2 = b2

LogicalProject(a1=[$1], a2=[$0], b1=[$3], b2=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(a2=[$1], a1=[$0]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a2=[SUM($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a1=[$0], a2=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalProject(b2=[$1], b1=[$0]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b2=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(b1=[$0], b2=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Calc(select=[a1, a2, b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Join(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a2, b2)], select=[a2, a1, b2, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) : +- Calc(select=[a2, a1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) : +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1, SUM(a2) AS a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b2]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Calc(select=[b2, b1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b1], select=[b1, SUM(b2) AS b2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testJoinWithSort
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable3 FULL JOIN (SELECT * FROM MyTable4 ORDER BY MyTable4.i DESC, MyTable4.k ASC) MyTable4 ON MyTable3.i = MyTable4.i and MyTable3.i = MyTable4.k

LogicalProject(i=[$0], j=[$1], t=[$2], i0=[$3], k=[$4]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), =($0, $4))], joinType=[full]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(i, j, t)]]]) +- LogicalProject(i=[$0], k=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable4, source: [TestTableSource(i, k)]]])

Join(joinType=[FullOuterJoin], where=[AND(=(i, i0), =(i, k))], select=[i, j, t, i0, k]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[i, i]]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(i, j, t)]]], fields=[i, j, t]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[i, k]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable4, source: [TestTableSource(i, k)]]], fields=[i, k])

TestCase.name: testLeftJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, b1 FROM A LEFT JOIN B ON a1 = b1

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Join(joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], where=[=(a1, b1)], select=[a1, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testLeftJoinNonEqui
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, b1 FROM A LEFT JOIN B ON a1 = b1 AND a2 > b2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), >($1, $4))], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Calc(select=[a1, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Join(joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], where=[AND(=(a1, b1), >(a2, b2))], select=[a1, a2, b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testLeftJoinWithEqualPkNonEqui
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, b1 FROM (SELECT SUM(a2) AS a2, a1 FROM A GROUP BY a1) LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(b2) AS b2, b1 FROM B GROUP BY b1) ON a1 = b1 AND a2 > b2

LogicalProject(a1=[$1], b1=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($1, $3), >($0, $2))], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalProject(a2=[$1], a1=[$0]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a2=[SUM($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a1=[$0], a2=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalProject(b2=[$1], b1=[$0]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b2=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(b1=[$0], b2=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Calc(select=[a1, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Join(joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], where=[AND(=(a1, b1), >(a2, b2))], select=[a2, a1, b2, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a2, a1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1, SUM(a2) AS a2], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b2, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b1], select=[b1, SUM(b2) AS b2], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testLeftJoinWithPk
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, a2, b1, b2 FROM (SELECT SUM(a2) AS a2, a1 FROM A GROUP BY a1) LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(b2) AS b2, b1 FROM B GROUP BY b1) ON a2 = b2

LogicalProject(a1=[$1], a2=[$0], b1=[$3], b2=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalProject(a2=[$1], a1=[$0]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a2=[SUM($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a1=[$0], a2=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalProject(b2=[$1], b1=[$0]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b2=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(b1=[$0], b2=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Calc(select=[a1, a2, b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Join(joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], where=[=(a2, b2)], select=[a2, a1, b2, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) : +- Calc(select=[a2, a1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) : +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1, SUM(a2) AS a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b2]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Calc(select=[b2, b1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b1], select=[b1, SUM(b2) AS b2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testLeftJoinWithPkNonEqui
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, a2, b1, b2 FROM (SELECT SUM(a2) AS a2, a1 FROM A GROUP BY a1) LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(b2) AS b2, b1 FROM B GROUP BY b1) ON a2 = b2 AND a1 > b1

LogicalProject(a1=[$1], a2=[$0], b1=[$3], b2=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $2), >($1, $3))], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalProject(a2=[$1], a1=[$0]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a2=[SUM($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a1=[$0], a2=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalProject(b2=[$1], b1=[$0]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b2=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(b1=[$0], b2=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Calc(select=[a1, a2, b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Join(joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], where=[AND(=(a2, b2), >(a1, b1))], select=[a2, a1, b2, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) : +- Calc(select=[a2, a1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) : +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1, SUM(a2) AS a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b2]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Calc(select=[b2, b1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b1], select=[b1, SUM(b2) AS b2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testLeftJoinWithRightNotPk
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, b1 FROM (SELECT SUM(a2) AS a2, a1 FROM A GROUP BY a1) LEFT JOIN B ON a1 = b1

LogicalProject(a1=[$1], b1=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $2)], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalProject(a2=[$1], a1=[$0]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a2=[SUM($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a1=[$0], a2=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Join(joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], where=[=(a1, b1)], select=[a1, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testLeftJoinWithRightNotPkNonEqui
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, b1 FROM (SELECT SUM(a2) AS a2, a1 FROM A GROUP BY a1) LEFT JOIN B ON a1 = b1 AND a2 > b2

LogicalProject(a1=[$1], b1=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($1, $2), >($0, $3))], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalProject(a2=[$1], a1=[$0]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a2=[SUM($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a1=[$0], a2=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Calc(select=[a1, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Join(joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], where=[AND(=(a1, b1), >(a2, b2))], select=[a2, a1, b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a2, a1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1, SUM(a2) AS a2], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testLeftOuterJoinEquiAndLocalPred
TestCase.Resource: SELECT b, y FROM t LEFT OUTER JOIN s ON a = z AND b < 2

LogicalProject(b=[$1], y=[$5]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $6), $3)], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], $f3=[<($1, 2)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[t, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[s, source: [TestTableSource(x, y, z)]]])

Calc(select=[b, y]) +- Join(joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], where=[AND(=(a, z), $f3)], select=[a, b, $f3, y, z]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a, b, <(b, 2) AS $f3]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[t, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[z]]) +- Calc(select=[y, z]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[s, source: [TestTableSource(x, y, z)]]], fields=[x, y, z])

TestCase.name: testLeftOuterJoinEquiAndNonEquiPred
TestCase.Resource: SELECT b, y FROM t LEFT OUTER JOIN s ON a = z AND b < x

LogicalProject(b=[$1], y=[$4]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $5), <($1, $3))], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[t, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[s, source: [TestTableSource(x, y, z)]]])

Calc(select=[b, y]) +- Join(joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], where=[AND(=(a, z), <(b, x))], select=[a, b, x, y, z]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a, b]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[t, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[z]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[s, source: [TestTableSource(x, y, z)]]], fields=[x, y, z])

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), >($1, $4))], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Join(joinType=[RightOuterJoin], where=[=(a1, b1)], select=[a1, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, b1 FROM (SELECT SUM(a2) AS a2, a1 FROM A GROUP BY a1) RIGHT JOIN (SELECT SUM(b2) AS b2, b1 FROM B GROUP BY b1) ON a1 = b1

LogicalProject(a1=[$1], b1=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $3)], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalProject(a2=[$1], a1=[$0]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a2=[SUM($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a1=[$0], a2=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalProject(b2=[$1], b1=[$0]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b2=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(b1=[$0], b2=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Join(joinType=[RightOuterJoin], where=[=(a1, b1)], select=[a1, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b1], select=[b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testRightJoinWithPk
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, a2, b1, b2 FROM (SELECT SUM(a2) AS a2, a1 FROM A group by a1) RIGHT JOIN (SELECT SUM(b2) AS b2, b1 FROM B group by b1) ON a2 = b2

LogicalProject(a1=[$1], a2=[$0], b1=[$3], b2=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalProject(a2=[$1], a1=[$0]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a2=[SUM($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a1=[$0], a2=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalProject(b2=[$1], b1=[$0]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b2=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(b1=[$0], b2=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Calc(select=[a1, a2, b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Join(joinType=[RightOuterJoin], where=[=(a2, b2)], select=[a2, a1, b2, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) : +- Calc(select=[a2, a1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) : +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1, SUM(a2) AS a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b2]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Calc(select=[b2, b1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b1], select=[b1, SUM(b2) AS b2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, a2, b1, b2 FROM (SELECT SUM(a2) AS a2, a1 FROM A GROUP BY a1) RIGHT JOIN (SELECT SUM(b2) AS b2, b1 FROM B GROUP BY b1) ON a2 = b2 AND a1 > b1

LogicalProject(a1=[$1], a2=[$0], b1=[$3], b2=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $2), >($1, $3))], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalProject(a2=[$1], a1=[$0]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a2=[SUM($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a1=[$0], a2=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalProject(b2=[$1], b1=[$0]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b2=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(b1=[$0], b2=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Calc(select=[a1, a2, b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Join(joinType=[RightOuterJoin], where=[AND(=(a2, b2), >(a1, b1))], select=[a2, a1, b2, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) : +- Calc(select=[a2, a1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) : +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1, SUM(a2) AS a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b2]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Calc(select=[b2, b1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b1], select=[b1, SUM(b2) AS b2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testRightJoinWithRightNotPk
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, b1 FROM (SELECT SUM(a2) AS a2, a1 FROM A group by a1) RIGHT JOIN B ON a1 = b1

LogicalProject(a1=[$1], b1=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $2)], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalProject(a2=[$1], a1=[$0]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a2=[SUM($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a1=[$0], a2=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Join(joinType=[RightOuterJoin], where=[=(a1, b1)], select=[a1, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testRightJoinWithRightNotPkNonEqui
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, b1 FROM (SELECT SUM(a2) AS a2, a1 FROM A GROUP BY a1) RIGHT JOIN B ON a1 = b1 AND a2 > b2

LogicalProject(a1=[$1], b1=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($1, $2), >($0, $3))], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalProject(a2=[$1], a1=[$0]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a2=[SUM($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a1=[$0], a2=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Calc(select=[a1, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Join(joinType=[RightOuterJoin], where=[AND(=(a1, b1), >(a2, b2))], select=[a2, a1, b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a2, a1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1, SUM(a2) AS a2], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testRightJoinWithEqualPkNonEqui
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, b1 FROM (SELECT SUM(a2) AS a2, a1 FROM A GROUP BY a1) RIGHT JOIN (SELECT SUM(b2) AS b2, b1 FROM B GROUP BY b1) ON a1 = b1 AND a2 > b2

LogicalProject(a1=[$1], b1=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($1, $3), >($0, $2))], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalProject(a2=[$1], a1=[$0]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a2=[SUM($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a1=[$0], a2=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]]) +- LogicalProject(b2=[$1], b1=[$0]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b2=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(b1=[$0], b2=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]])

Calc(select=[a1, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- Join(joinType=[RightOuterJoin], where=[AND(=(a1, b1), >(a2, b2))], select=[a2, a1, b2, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a2, a1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1, SUM(a2) AS a2], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[a1, a2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[A, source: [TestTableSource(a1, a2, a3)]]], fields=[a1, a2, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b2, b1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[b1], select=[b1, SUM(b2) AS b2], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[b1, b2], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[B, source: [TestTableSource(b1, b2, b3)]]], fields=[b1, b2, b3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testRightOuterJoinEquiAndLocalPred
TestCase.Resource: SELECT b, x FROM t RIGHT OUTER JOIN s ON a = z AND x < 2

LogicalProject(b=[$1], x=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $5), $6)], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[t, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(x=[$0], y=[$1], z=[$2], $f3=[<($0, 2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[s, source: [TestTableSource(x, y, z)]]])

Calc(select=[b, x]) +- Join(joinType=[RightOuterJoin], where=[AND(=(a, z), $f3)], select=[a, b, x, z, $f3]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a, b]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[t, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[z]]) +- Calc(select=[x, z, <(x, 2) AS $f3]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[s, source: [TestTableSource(x, y, z)]]], fields=[x, y, z])

TestCase.name: testRightOuterJoinEquiAndNonEquiPred
TestCase.Resource: SELECT b, y FROM t RIGHT OUTER JOIN s ON a = z AND b < x

LogicalProject(b=[$1], y=[$4]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $5), <($1, $3))], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[t, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[s, source: [TestTableSource(x, y, z)]]])

Calc(select=[b, y]) +- Join(joinType=[RightOuterJoin], where=[AND(=(a, z), <(b, x))], select=[a, b, x, y, z]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a, b]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[t, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[z]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[s, source: [TestTableSource(x, y, z)]]], fields=[x, y, z])

TestCase.name: testSelfJoinPlan
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM src WHERE key = 0) src1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM src WHERE key = 0) src2 ON (src1.key = src2.key AND src2.key > 10)

LogicalProject(key=[$0], v=[$1], key0=[$2], v0=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $2), $4)], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalProject(key=[$0], v=[$1]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, 0)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[src, source: [TestTableSource(key, v)]]]) +- LogicalProject(key=[$0], v=[$1], $f2=[>($0, 10)]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, 0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[src, source: [TestTableSource(key, v)]]])

Join(joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], where=[=(key, key0)], select=[key, v, key0, v0], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[AccRetract]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[key]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- Calc(select=[CAST(0:BIGINT) AS key, v], where=[=(key, 0:BIGINT)], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[src, source: [TestTableSource(key, v)]]], fields=[key, v], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[key]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- Values(tuples=[[]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])
